title: Biden Spins His Economic Record Ahead of Elections
description: The president’s recent comments on Social Security, the deficit and economic growth claim credit where it is not always due.
dc:creator: Alan Rappeport and Jim Tankersley
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: White House officials have sometimes been forced to awkwardly correct President Biden’s claims. Other times, they have doubled down on them.
